name: City Police Chase Car Escape
description:
Police Car Chase - Criminal Case is the latest extreme police car driving simulator, the best one right now, available for free!
Take control of different police cars (SUV and 4x4) the big city !
Accomplish a lot of variety of missions to become a good cop.
Ready to feel the need for speed, officer? Do you want to go fast and have no limits? Now you can!Make your choice between city cars, offroad cars, and speed cars.
The system of missions is based on GTA : drive on the map and find one of the 20 spots to launch a mission.
Use the helpful mini map to know where the missions spots are.
Be the best police car driver officer in the city. Forget using brakes and boost your cop car to overtake the criminals and make them stop in their tracks, Take police car driving to new heights.

The map is very huge, and contains a lot of point of interest.
Like a cascade and a lake, a Japanese temple, a small airport, different houses and farms, ruins, a camping place, and more...
Choose from a wide selection of police cars and drive wherever you want in the city paradise. Experience the biggest, fastest drifts, and gain top speeds to catch the robbers execute difficult stunts like the loop de loop!


GAME FEATURES

- Full heads-up display
- Dynamic camera angles
- The realistic car physics
- Explore our massively detailed open world
- Choose from a selection of high quality vehicles, from super cars to offroad Jeep Suv!
- Easy to use driving controls, touch and tilt, and both left and right handed controls!
- Both touch and tilt controls
- Each incredibly detail police cars made just for this game!
- Best police car driving simulator ever

!! Police Car Driving contains 15 levels !!
